H0.text: los angeles stadium at hollywood park opening date. 2019

H1.text: los angeles stadium at hollywood park opening date. 2021

H2.text: los angeles stadium at hollywood park opening date. 2022

H3.text: los angeles stadium at hollywood park opening date. 2020

A4.text: Open in September 2020, the stadium has a capacity of 70,240, expandable to over 100,000 for major events, and a translucent roof made of ETFE panels allowing for sunlight and climate control.

A5.text: On May 18, 2017, developers announced that record rainfall in the area had postponed the stadium's completion and opening from 2019 until the 2020 NFL season.
